cause.description:
Indiana has alllowed the BP refinery in northwest indiana to dump mercury and other toxic substances into lake michigan for at least 5 years. Iniana regulators tihnk that the refinery will keep dumping the toxic metals after those 5 years. The BP refinery is dumping 2 punds of mercury into the lake every year. Mercury is very toxic and can threaten fish and people. Note that Lake Michigan is our drinking water and the BP refineries are reversing years of work to clean up the lake. If BP met the federal mercury standard it would take 125 years to dump as much mercury into our lake as it does in the 5 that they plan to/
1. Stop dumping toxic metals in lake michigan.
2. Save our drinking water
3. Stop Pollution
cause.mission: Stop BP gas stations from dumping mercury in our lake
cause.name: Stop putting Mercury In Lake Michigan
